title: Paddy Field facing Land for Sale.
details:
Beautiful Paddy Field facing 1 Acre Land for Sale in Malagala, Padukka. About 700 meters to Malagala Horana road. Entire land surrounded with nice scenaries. Rectangular shape flat solid land with very clear title.

Electricity, Wide Road Access, Spring Water and good mobile reception

- 15 Feet wide good access road upto the property.

- Slightly slope square shape land.

- Nice paddy filed view.

Suitable for a Holiday Resort/ Bungalow, Factory/ Warehouse/ Stores, Elders Home, Reception/ Banquet Hall, Water bottling Plant etc.
